title: Unable to share Instagram posts to my stories.
content:
I'm using the Pixel 4, and I am unable to share public Instagram posts to my stories. I just don't have the option under the 'share' function. I've tried clearing my cache, switching settings on and off, reinstalling the app and signed up to the BETA version. I used to have a Pixel 2 and had this same issue. I've sent feedback to Instagram to no avail (unsurprisingly).

I know iPhone users, and other Android users have this option. Are any other Pixel users having this issue?
